DataAnalysis

Class DataSet

  • java.lang.Object
    • DataAnalysis.DataSet

  • public class DataSet
extends java.lang.Object
    Computes information about a set of data values.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DataSet()
      Constructs an empty data set.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void add(double x)
      Adds a data value to the data set
      double getAverage()
      Gets the average of the added data.
      double getMaximum()
      Gets the largest of the added data.
      double getMin()
      Gets the smallest of the added data.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

      • DataSet

        public DataSet()
        Constructs an empty data set.

    • Method Detail

      • add

        public void add(double x)
        Adds a data value to the data set
        Parameters:
        x - a data value

      • getAverage

        public double getAverage()
        Gets the average of the added data.
        Returns:
        the average or 0 if no data has been added

      • getMaximum

        public double getMaximum()
        Gets the largest of the added data.
        Returns:
        the maximum or 0 if no data has been added

      • getMin

        public double getMin()
        Gets the smallest of the added data.
        Returns:
        the minimun or 99999999999999999999.0 if no data has been added
